name: Check Your 6!
description: “Check Your 6” brings you in the middle of the World War II battles, with a turn-based game that carries the spirit of the dogfights.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Pentium 4 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512Mb DirectX 9 video card with shader model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2035 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card Additional Notes: 64 bit only
